quiz.startCaption: Start answering to see your freshness level!

1.q: When did you last learn a new programming language or framework?

2.q: How often do you read technical blogs, documentation, or follow tech news?

options.1: Daily or several times a week

3.q: What's your primary tech stack's relevance?

4.q: How do you feel when facing completely unfamiliar technology?

options.1: Excited! I love learning new things
options.2: Confident I can figure it out
options.4: Prefer to stick with what I know

5.q: How active are you in tech communities?

options.1: Very active: contribute, answer questions, engage regularly
options.3: Minimally: only when I need help

6.q: When solving problems, you tend to:

options.1: Explore modern best practices and new approaches
options.2: Mix proven methods with some newer techniques
options.3: Rely on approaches that have worked before
options.4: Stick to 'the way we've always done it'

7.q: How much time do you dedicate to learning vs. doing familiar work?

options.1: 20%+ of my time on continuous learning
options.4: Almost entirely focused on familiar tasks

8.q: When was your last side project or open-source contribution?

9.q: How familiar are you with AI/ML tools in your workflow?

options.1: Actively using them daily (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, etc.)
options.3: Aware of them but haven't really used them
options.4: Not interested or don't see the value

10.q: How comfortable are you with cloud technologies?

options.1: Deploy and manage cloud infrastructure regularly
options.2: Use cloud services but basics only

result.title: You're {{ resultCategory }}!
result.linkText: I took the "Which dairy embodies your tech skills?" quiz and I'm {{ resultName }}! ðŸŽ¯ Score: {{ score }}/50 ({{ percentage }}%)

cream.name: Fresh Cream
cream.description: You're at the cutting edge! Your skills are fresh and constantly being renewed, but remember: you need regular refreshing to stay this way. Keep that momentum going!
cream.advice: Consider mentoring others to deepen your knowledge while staying current.

yogurt.name: Yogurt
yogurt.description: You're actively cultivating your skills through regular practice and learning. You've got good cultures growing, and with consistent care, you'll keep getting better!
yogurt.advice: Focus on depth in a few areas while maintaining breadth awareness.

cheese.name: Aged Cheese
cheese.description: Your foundational skills are solid and actually improve with time. Like a fine cheese, you've got expertise that deepens. Just make sure you're not getting too crusty around the edges!
cheese.advice: Balance your deep expertise with exposure to emerging trends in your field.

butter.name: Butter
butter.description: You're versatile and stable, surviving most environments. Your skills are reliable but might need some freshening up to spread into new areas.
butter.advice: Set aside dedicated time each week for learning something new.

iceCream.name: Ice Cream
iceCream.description: Your skills might be melting under pressure! Time to get back in the freezer and preserve what you have while adding new flavors. The good news? It's never too late to refresh!
iceCream.advice: Start with small, consistent learning habits. Pick one new skill to focus on this month.
